list.name: FinanceBOT
list.desc: Telegram bot for personal finance tracking and paid subscriptions.
list.details:
FinanceBOT is a Telegram bot that helps you manage personal finance right in chat.

### Key Features
• **Transactions** — add income/expenses, view balance, history of operations.
• **Budget & Goals** — set a monthly limit, track progress toward goals.
• **Reports** — period summary, charts, CSV export.
• **Paid Plan** — payment verification and renewal reminders.

### Tech stack
Python 3.12 • Aiogram 3 • SQLite + SQLModel • Docker • CI/CD (GitHub Actions → Docker Hub)

list.name: Classic Coffee
list.desc: Telegram bot for pre-ordering coffee without waiting in line.
list.details:
Classic Coffee lets you order a drink in advance so you arrive to a ready cup.

#### Features
• Menu with photos and prices.
• Payment via Telegram Pay.
• "Your drink is ready" notifications.
• Barista web-panel to mark order status.

#### Stack
Python • Aiogram • FastAPI (admin API) • PostgreSQL • Docker Compose.

list.name: School Diary Bot
list.desc: Electronic diary in Telegram: grades, alerts, statistics.
list.details:
A Telegram bot that completely replaces the traditional electronic diary.

* Student login via token.
* Grades table, average by subject.
* Push notifications about new marks.
* Performance statistics and a quarter chart.

Built with Aiogram 3 + Router modules, async MongoDB driver, PyTest.
